casebody.data:
Frederick H. Betts, et al., Respondents, v. The Eagleton Manufacturing Co., Appellants. Decided July 2, 1886. Appeal from order of reference to hear and determine. John E. Parsons, for appellant. Thomas Hunt, for respondents.

Before Truax and Ingraham, JJ.

Opinion

Per Curiam.

Order reversed, with $10 costs and disbursements, and motion to refer denied.
